nav.presentation: Hi! My name is Marc and I'm a Junior Software Developer. Welcome to my personal website!

landing.presentation: Hello and welcome to my personal web page. My name is Marc and I am a software developer specialized in front end and backend development for web apps. Iâ€™m also interested in game development for mobile devices. On this page I'll be posting the projects that I make.

skills.title: Web development
skills.description: Prototyping of web pages using latest standards like HTML5, CSS3, responsive design and media queries. I'm familiar with new Javascript frameworks and , in special, ReactJS is the one I've used the most.

skills.title: Programming languages
skills.description: I'm experienced with many programming languages. The three languages that I use the most are Java, Javascript and C#.

skills.title: Backend & Micro services
skills.description: I'm faimiliar with backend & micro services development. On this area I used Spring Framework and also Nodejs. User authentication using JWT, JSON and XML formats. Docker containers...

skills.title: Databases
skills.description: I'm experienced with SQL (DDL+DML) on relational databases (tables, views, triggers). For my personal projects I normally use Postgresql, but I'm also familiar with MySql and SqlServer. In addition, In some of my personal projects I've used a NoSQL DB like MongoDB with Mongoose library

skills.title: Games
skills.description: I'm familiar with the Unity game engine. So far I've make one 2D adventure game and recently I did a clone of the famous Crossy Road for practising 3D game development

skills.title: Tools
skills.description: Like the vast majory of developers I use Git for version control with services like Github and Gitlab. Other tools that I'm familiar with are Postman for testing REST services and MagicDraw for UML modeling

projects.title: Gifty
projects.description: Web application for searching and saving your favorite gifs using Giphy's API service. The front end is made with ReactJS. For the backend I've made two implementations using different technologies. The first one was made with Wildfly + PostgreSQL and the second one with NodeJS + MongoDB.

projects.title: Crossy croak
projects.description: 3D game made with Unity for learning purposes. It is a clone of the famous game Crossy Road. The game includes some characters present on the original game and some created by myself. All 3D models have been made with MagicaVoxel. Actually, you can play it on Android and PC.

projects.title: The little Wizard
projects.description: It is a 2D adventure game made with Unity. The game tells the story of a young wizard. Throughout this story, the wizard will have to learn spells, defeat monstres and solve some puzzles. You can watch the teaser of the game here and, if you want to play it, download it from here.
